name: Cyber City Heist
description:
Created in 24 hours for Retro Game Jam 2019 @ JCU

(Secret Jam Theme 2019 'Humans, Robots and Cyborgs')

Coding, Sound, Game Design and Idea: Clementine (Github)

Art, Animation and Level Design: Ze Feng (ArtStation)

Game is playable but not fully playtested to be balanced or fun due to time constraints. It's designed to showcase the aesthetic, game mechanics and design in a short level for presentation while aiming to nail a retro vector wireframe artstyle. 

Main inspirations for the artstyle include Tempest (1981) and Major Havoc (1983).

Game was made in Unity 2D. All music and sound assets were created using free music software FamiTracker.

Controls: WASD to move. Mouse 1 to shoot. Spacebar to jump.

---

Additional Credits

Voice Actor for Trailer (non Jam participant): Eric Saldanha (Twitter @EricMSaldanha)
